A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved seeing the development of the characters and the departure from all good/bad\, black/white\, because people in life are shades of grey. I enjoyed seeing the different storylines\, woven together\, with crucial decisions and disasters in each. I loved that there wasn't a storybook easy ending to any of them. I felt the conflicts felt real and actually part of the characters and events and not just something tossed away and simple. I will miss our General/Princess in the future\, she was wonderful here.
